author: A_Brickset_user
title: Fabulous looking set
review: I just recently acquired a MISB one of these. They sure don't make Lego sets like these anymore. (Although, 4404 come close). The color scheme is unparallelled; black with red/yellow trim and TRANS BLUE windows. Awesome. My only complaint is that some stickers go on slope bricks, and those surfaces are way too rugged for the sticker to stick.

author: placan
title: amazing
review: this is a perfectly "model team" set. awesome details, playability and very useful parts included. the best model team set ever. the red/yellow strips like a my supported team galatasaray. absolutely get it now.
